job.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <strong>An AI engineering company that creates software solutions that go beyond conventional AI is looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join their team!<br><br></strong>This Jobot Job is hosted by Matt Mahoney<br><br>Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.<br><br>Salary $170,000 - $225,000 per year<br><br><strong>A Bit About Us<br><br></strong>This is a well-funded computer software company that was founded in 2014 and raised a $133M Series C last year. They are an AI/ML focused startup servicing the Energy, Healthcare and Finance sectors by building industrial AI MVPs and POCs for larger corporations. They are looking for a Senior ML Engineer to build modern ML models for their products and work with their software team to deploy and maintain the models in production.<br><br><strong><br><br><strong>Why join us?<br><br></strong></strong><ul><li> Very competitive Base Salary</li><li> Equity</li><li> Yearly Bonus</li><li> Generous PTO</li><li> Full Healthcare Coverage (Medical, Dental, Vision)</li><li> This is an opportunity to join a well-funded and growing Computer Software startup!!<br></li></ul><strong>Job Details<br><br></strong>The ideal candidate has experience with<br><ul><li> Python</li><li> Tensorflow</li><li> PyTorch</li><li> Keras</li><li> Spark</li><li> AWS or Azure (plus)</li><li> Cubflow or MLflow (plus)<br></li></ul>Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
